mapper.select: select a.id as aid,a.comment_counts,DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createDate,a.title,a.view_counts, u.avatar,u.id as uid,u.nickname,b.id as bid,b.content_html,b.content,c.id as cid,c.categoryname,c.description from me_article a left join sys_user u on u.id = a.author_id left join me_article_body b on b.id = a.body_id left join me_category c on c.id = a.category_id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.deleted = 0
select year(create_date) as year,month(create_date) as month,count(*) as count from me_article where deleted = 0 group by year(create_date),month(create_date)

select a.id as aid,a.comment_counts, a.create_date, a.summary, a.title, a.view_counts, a.weight, u.id as uid,u.nickname from me_article a left join sys_user u on u.id = a.author_id where a.deleted = 0 order by a.view_counts
select DISTINCT at.tag_id as id,t.tagname from me_article_tag at join me_tag t on at.tag_id = t.id where article_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
